title: Are veggie straws a healthy snack to have when trying to lose ... - Reddit
body: Are veggie straws a healthy snack to have when trying to lose weight? Nope. Eat actual veggies. Just know that they're made mostly of potato starch, just colored with vegetable juice/powder (beet root, turmeric, spinach powder) so that they look like their made out of healthier vegetables.
readable_content:
mbloom007 (2016-04-19): Are veggie straws a healthy snack to have when trying to lose weight?
Ask ECAH

- vivmarie (2016-04-19): Nope. Eat actual veggies.

- Jo_MamaSo (2016-04-19): They're basically different colored, different shaped Pringles.

- catlover164 (2016-04-19): Try celery root french fries, zucchini chips, roasted radish chips, or turnip fries.

- Mr_BoZipher (2016-04-19): I highly recommend not snacking at all. If you feel you need to snack, go for fruits or veggies.

- frenchfrites (2016-04-19): They're very high in sodium. Choose a different snack.

- [deleted] (2016-04-19): I like them as an alternative to chips.

- Ammoholic (2016-04-19): They're mostly potato starch and flour. Much better options out there.
